### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(http://digitalknob.com/Download/Libs/libwebsockets-2.2-stable.zip libwebsockets-2.2-stable)
DKSET(WEBSOCKETS ${3RDPARTY}/libwebsockets-2.2-stable)


### LINK ###
##DKINCLUDE(${WEBSOCKETS}/include)
##WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${WEBSOCKETS}/${OS}/Debug/lib/.libs/libWEBSOCKETS.lib)
##WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${WEBSOCKETS}/${OS}/Release/lib/.libs/libWEBSOCKETS.lib)
##APPLE_DEBUG_LIB(${WEBSOCKETS}/${OS}/${DEBUG}/lib/.libs/libWEBSOCKETS.a)
##APPLE_RELEASE_LIB(${WEBSOCKETS}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/lib/.libs/libWEBSOCKETS.a)
##LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${WEBSOCKETS}/${OS}/Debug/lib/.libs/libWEBSOCKETS.a)
##LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${WEBSOCKETS}/${OS}/Release/lib/.libs/libWEBSOCKETS.a)
##ANDROID_DEBUG_LIB(${WEBSOCKETS}/${OS}/Debug/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libWEBSOCKETS.a)
##ANDROID_RELEASE_LIB(${WEBSOCKETS}/${OS}/Release/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libWEBSOCKETS.a)


### COMPILE ###
